name: Epsilon
headline: AI Search Engine for Academic Research
description: Get answers to research questions with citations from the academic literature.

founders.name: Eshan Agarwal, Founder
founders.description: Eshan worked on ML/AI for FB News, has co-authored 3 papers in HCI, and has built zero to one products since high school.

# AI Search Engine For
Scientific Research
Cut twenty hours of research down to just twenty minutes
enter
to submit
Request A DemoStart Now For Free
 _Want to try an example question? Click on any of the ones below:_
How does eating sugar before bed affect sleep quality?
How is hydrogen used for creating clean fuel?
In deep learning, why does attention perform better than LSTMs?
How do the DNA damage repair pathways work?
How has social media affected mental health amongst young adults?
What are the common genetic targets used for treating lung cancer?
What is the effect of minimum wage on inequality?
How does eating sugar before bed affect sleep quality?
How is hydrogen used for creating clean fuel?
In deep learning, why does attention perform better than LSTMs?
How do the DNA damage repair pathways work?
How has social media affected mental health amongst young adults?
What are the common genetic targets used for treating lung cancer?
What is the effect of minimum wage on inequality?
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fhero.7abb2563.png&w=3840&q=75)
Investigate
Get Answers With Citations
Ask any research question and Epsilon will scan through more than 200 million papers to find evidence relevant to your question. It will then summarize the relevant passages to provide a ChatGPT-like answer that contains inline references to the underlying source content.
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/1/a.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/1/a.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/1/b.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/1/c.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/1/d.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/1/e.png)
Search
Search For Publications and Patents
Find publications and patents to help with your research. Epsilon will help group search results into latest research, key texts, and most relevant articles. You can open the papers directly or if a PDF is publicly available, save it to your library.
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/a.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/a.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/b.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/c.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/d.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/e.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/f.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/g.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/2/h.png)
Validate
Extract Information From Multiple Papers At Once
Epsilon can help you scan multiple papers for key information. Enter any question or claim, and Epsilon will scan through the top search results automatically and extract relevant information from each document. This is great for evaluating running meta-analyses, finding citations, or searching for evidence of a claim.
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/3/a.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/3/a.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/3/b.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/3/c.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/3/d.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/3/e.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/3/f.png)
Synthesize
Save, Summarize, and Search Across Papers
Upload papers and Epsilon will provide a comprehensive summary of the introduction, results and conclusion. Create libraries and save papers to organize your research. Run searches across your entire library to synthesize results across papers you trust.
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/a.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/a.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/b.png)

![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/e.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/f.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/g.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/h.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/i.png)
![#](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/features/4/j.png)
Trusted By Over 30,000 Researchers
Researchers use Epsilon to help with
  * Searching For Evidence
  * Finding Citations
  * Writing Grants
  * Running Literature Reviews
  * Conducting Meta-Analyses
  * Evaluating Research Questions
  * Drafting Proposals
  * Executing Projects
  * Writing Papers
  * Searching For Patents
  * Onboarding Team Members
  * Learning New Topics


From institutions across the world including

  * ![Logo](https://www.epsilon-ai.com/landing-page/customer-logos/nyu.jpg)

Unlimited searches

Early access features
Priority support
Patent Anlaysis
Contact Us
Technology
Dataset
Epsilon uses a dataset provided by Semantic Scholar, which contains over 200 million academic papers including ones from PubMed, arXiv, Papers With Code, and more.
AI
For each search query, Epsilon finds the top 100 related papers and passes them along with your query to GPT-4 to generate a summary of the scientific information. Because it uses citations to academic literature, Epsilon is a factual and trustworthy way to use AI for your research.
Privacy
Epsilon passes search queries to third party infrastructure providers like OpenAI. However, none of this data can be traced back to you individually. The same is true for the papers that you add to your library.

generated_description:
**Epsilon: Reshaping Academic Research with AI**

Founded in 2022 and hailing from New York, Epsilon is an ambitious startup on a mission to revolutionize academic research using artificial intelligence. As a proud participant in the Y Combinator Batch W23, this lean operation—currently just two employees—is already making waves in the education and productivity sectors.

**What's the Deal?**

Epsilon offers an AI-powered search engine specifically tailored for academic research. Imagine cutting down hours of research into just minutes—Epsilon does precisely that. Users can ask questions ranging from "How does eating sugar before bed affect sleep quality?" to "What are common genetic targets used for treating lung cancer?" and in response, Epsilon sifts through over 200 million academic papers to provide concise, citation-backed answers.

**Key Features**

1. **Investigate**: Get answers with citations easily by scanning vast academic literature.
2. **Search**: Effortlessly find publications and patents, grouping results for quick access.
3. **Validate**: Extract information from multiple papers simultaneously—a game-changer for meta-analysis.
4. **Synthesize**: Upload papers for a comprehensive summary, helping to organize your research efficiently.

With over 30,000 researchers already leveraging Epsilon’s tools, institutions like Berkeley, Stanford, and NYU trust this platform to enhance their research endeavors.

**Pricing Model**

Epsilon operates on a flexible pricing model:

- **Free**: A trial version allowing users to perform up to 25 searches at no charge.
- **Student**: At just $4.08 per month (billed annually), this plan is designed for active students needing research assistance.
- **Professional**: For $10.75 per month, professionals can access expanded features, including priority support.
- **Organization**: Tailored plans for research organizations, ensuring efficient research processes across teams.

Epsilon utilizes a comprehensive dataset from Semantic Scholar, ensuring that the information fetched is both vast and reliable. Their AI leverages GPT-4 to generate insightful, concise outputs, with a commitment to user privacy.

**The Future of Research is Here**

Epsilon is carving out a niche in the academic world by melding efficiency with cutting-edge tech. As research questions become more intricate, Epsilon is well-positioned to provide the tools needed for researchers to thrive in an increasingly complex environment. To learn more, visit their website at [Epsilon.ai](https://www.epsilon-ai.com).
